actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of William Kubrick, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums to a named individual: (1) for legal representation; and (2) in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States for personal injuries, medical expenses, and loss of earnings due to allegedly negligent surgery performed by a Veterans Administration hospital physician.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of William Kubrick, and for other purposes.
